name: Stukov
title: Infested Admiral
description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

abilities.name: Healing Pathogen
abilities.description: Infest an allied Hero with a Healing Pathogen that heals the target for 210 Health over 4.5 seconds. Healing Pathogens can spread to a nearby allied Hero every 0.75 seconds, and a single Healing Pathogen can spread to each allied Hero 1 time.

abilities.name: Weighted Pustule
abilities.description: Hurl a pustule that impacts all enemy Heroes in its path, dealing 20 damage and Slowing by 5%, increasing to 50% over 3 seconds. Deals an additional 80 damage upon expiring or being removed.

abilities.name: Lurking Arm
abilities.description: Channel at a target location, creating an area that deals 136 damage per second to non-Structure enemies and Silences them. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes. Does not cost Mana while Channeling, and lasts until canceled or interrupted.

heroics.name: Flailing Swipe
heroics.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

heroics.name: Massive Shove
heroics.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

original.name: Stukov
original.title: Infested Admiral
original.description: Alexei Stukov had a hard life, and an even harder death. He has been betrayed, shot into space, resurrected and infested, almost cured, and then experimented upon as the infestation returned. Now, his infestation spreads within the Nexus...
original.shortDescription: A Healer that brings high amounts of disruption from long range.

baseHeroInfo.name: Stukov
baseHeroInfo.title: Infested Admiral
baseHeroInfo.description: Alexei Stukov had a hard life, and an even harder death. He has been betrayed, shot into space, resurrected and infested, almost cured, and then experimented upon as the infestation returned. Now, his infestation spreads within the Nexus...
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Healer that brings high amounts of disruption from long range.

role.name: Support
role.description: Support Healers, buffers, and everyone’s best friends.

trait.name: Bio-Kill Switch
trait.description: Activate to detonate all of Stukov's Viruses. Each Healing Pathogen heals its target for 475 health, and each Weighted Pustule does 100 damage and Slows its target by 70% for 2 seconds. Can be cast while Channeling Lurking Arm.

skins.name: Infested Admiral
skins.description: Alexei Stukov had a hard life, and an even harder death. He has been betrayed, shot into space, resurrected and infested, almost cured, and then experimented upon as the infestation returned. Now, his infestation spreads within the Nexus...

skins.name: Admiral Krakenov
skins.description: Decades ago, a mutiny forced the Admiral of the Three Anchors to walk the plank. On moonless nights, his form haunts Blackheart's Bay, calling itself "Krakenov" and demanding a lot of fish.
